projects.name: RAG Food Project - AI-Powered Data System
projects.description: Built an intelligent data system using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture, demonstrating ability to integrate modern AI with infrastructure. System fetches, processes, and serves data across local, cloud, and web environments.

key_achievements: Designed and implemented multi-environment data synchronization
Developed AI prompting strategies for accurate system responses
Automated deployment workflows using GitHub Actions
Demonstrated understanding of distributed systems and data flow
learnings: Cloud networking and data routing patterns
projects.relevance_to_networking: Showcases understanding of data flow, cloud infrastructure, API communication, and distributed systems - all critical for modern network engineering roles

projects.description: A system that is used for the Registrar in the University for proper recording of scholarships per semester.
